did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Architectural drawings, blueprints, photographs, and notebooks concerning the architectural practice of Clark Jonathan Lawrence. Also includes material concerning the architectural practice of Ackerman & Platt.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Clark Jonathan Lawrence, an architect, practiced in New York, New Haven, Chicago, and Palm Beach. Frederick L. Ackerman of Ackerman & Platt was in the Cornell University Class of 1901.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Architectural drawings, blueprints, photographs, and notebooks concerning the architectural practice of Clark Jonathan Lawrence. Also includes material concerning the architectural practice of Ackerman & Platt.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Clark Jonathan Lawrence Papers, #2722. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
